source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT [CutOff Time] AS LastCutoffTime FROM [Integration].[ETL Cutoff] Where [Table Name] ='[Dimension].[Employee]'
SELECT MAX([Data Load Started]) as LatestSystemCutOffTime From Integration.Lineage where [Table Name] ='[Dimension].[Employee]' and [Data Load Completed] is null
